documents.document: Starting a 7km walk needing to pee. This is living on the edge.
The @NewshubNZ team clearly not in Wellington today as they wax lyrical about 'summer finally arriving!' #notfuckinghere
@jenthinksharder amaze. You are now my guinea pig. Tell me how it goes :D
@jenthinksharder what does coconut oil do?
I legitimately just welled up watching the weather forecast for the coming week in Wellington. Not in the good way. #IWANTSOMEFUCKINGSUMMER
Holy fuck, this cricket though #NZvAUS
I don't mean to be ungrateful, but seriously, the sun only appearing at 6.20pm does nothing for my house painting, washing or tan.
The look of pure bliss on all of the parents faces at school drop this morning was almost comical #freedom #lovethelittlebastardsreally
I just ate 6 sausages. This is going to be regretful come tomorrow.....
I'm as confused as anyone as to why I am wide awake at 3.30am. It's pretty dumb bro.
Apparently the lawn mowing and house painting fairies decided not to show in my holidaying absence. WHAT THE FUCK?!? #useless
Goin' home. Smell ya later #TriOSummer17 https://t.co/iNTy9sARYC
Huka Jetting, ultimate touristing. Freakin' awesome #TriOSummer17 https://t.co/uUHOf3JuIL
I am leaving on Thursday. Of course. #fuckyouweathergods https://t.co/uC6vS9YTiM
Seriously though, that Warehouse Stationary tag line 'we do doing' is fucking ridiculous. Their ad agency should be fired. And sued.

Oh yes, that's quite pleasant #TriOSummer17 https://t.co/6eOf6UgwbO
@TravelBBQDrink clearly, cos my waist won't be looking at the pants again. #greatspend #keeponeating
Purchased a smaller pant size unseen in my wardrobe for 20-ish years. Had pizza and chippies for dinner. WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH ME?!?!
Know what I love best about holidays? Fucken everything. #TriOsummer17 https://t.co/Oz7PssBb4n
Let's rock this! #TriOSummer17 https://t.co/y9p5jPozC4
I'm on muthafuckn leave for 3 weeks bitches!!!! Prepare for the holiday spam #TriOSummer17
Popcorn and a mini choc bar iceblock for dinner. Fuck I adult good when the kids aren't around
Just tidied my plastic container cupboard. I'm telling ya, the satisfaction is unparalleled #Ineedalife #itissatisfyingthough
@HatePash1 yeah, okay, lets. Gym open as normal? 6.30?
@HatePash1 @ITHeavyHitters I'm on coffee #2 now, still carefully contemplating....
I dressed in active wear today in the hopes I might actually be active. Now I'm going to a cafe to drink coffee and contemplate it.
This Friday night was proudly brought to you by Working 'til 7 and Then Mowing The Lawns. Isn't adulting FUN?!
Hot cross buns? Fuck off https://t.co/IhGPCj8SGC
So many holiday snaps on facey, it's killing me. Hope I get to return the summery jealousy in a few weeks... #Iwannaholiday #inthesun
Uh-oh, someone's a back-to-work-grump #sorrynotsorry
She's wishing everyone a 'beautiful day' as she distributes the beverages. Forget your fucking platitudes and focus on the coffee, woman.
There's a new barista. This could be a disaster. A fucking disaster.
She always goes for the longest stick. Then runs passed me, taking out my legs. Bitch https://t.co/9EZpQhQLOQ

I have to go to the warehouse this morning. Pray for me. Pray for those around me.
